description._content: Description: Chinese and Negroes. Chinese Merchants and Child. Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. Chinese Merchants. Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. A Group of Chinese Ladies. Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. Chinese Lady. Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. A Black Woman, a Creole of the Colony, dressed in Colonial fashion Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. A Black Man, a domestic servant Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. An Ancient Black Woman Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Description: Chinese and Negroes. A Mulatto girl, selling baskets. Location: Guyana Date: 1870-1931 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/355 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives, uploaded as part of the Caribbean Through a Lens project. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. We need your help to fill in the gaps, to unearth the missing stories, the social and cultural memories from this selection of colonial recordings. Do you recognise anything or anyone in the photographs? Do they provoke any personal or historical memories? If so, please leave your comments, tags and stories to enrich our records. If you would like to get involved in our community project Caribbean through a lens, we would love to hear from you. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
